snippet: The good news for those New Yorkers who need their help is that the leading Democratic candidates for mayor are focused on them.
abstract: Michael Powell Gotham column observes that the good news for members of struggling working class in New York is that the leading Democratic candidates for mayor are focused on their plights.
lead_paragraph: The good news for those New Yorkers who need their help is that the leading Democratic candidates for mayor are focused on them.

headline.main: For Votes, a Common Appeal to the Struggling  Residents in the City
headline.print_headline: For Votes, a Common Appeal to the Cry of a City of Struggling Hard-Workers
